entry.title: WIND WARNING , Gonzales Point
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:55 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Gonzales 10:00 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023
Temperature: 5.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 84 %
Dewpoint: 3.1°C
Wind: WSW 42 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm and hail late this afternoon. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 70 gusting to 90 near Juan de Fuca Strait this afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Becoming clear before morning. Risk of a thunderstorm and hail early this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 70 gusting to 90 near Juan de Fuca Strait early this evening. Wind becoming light near midnight then becoming north 30 overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023
